---
title: Mint Lock
description: Implement a contract that can delegate minting with limits.
sidebar_position: 110
---

<head>
  <title>{`Implement contract that can delegate minting with limits.`}</title>
  <meta charSet="utf-8" />
  <meta
    property="og:title"

  />
  <meta
    property="og:description"
    content="Implement a contract that can delegate minting with limits."
  />
</head>

The [mint-lock example] demonstrates how to write a contract that can delegate minting tokens from another address with limits on how much those addresses can mint across a specified time period.

The admin of the token contracts used must be the mint-lock contract.

[![Open in Codespaces](https://github.com/codespaces/badge.svg)][open-in-github-codespaces]

[![Open in Codeanywhere](https://codeanywhere.com/img/open-in-codeanywhere-btn.svg)][open-in-code-anywhere]

[open-in-code-anywhere]: https://app.codeanywhere.com/#https://github.com/stellar/soroban-examples
[mint-lock example]: https://github.com/stellar/soroban-examples/tree/v22.0.1/mint-lock
